attributes.action: Reduce yellow lines on inner city roads to allow more short stay free parking spaces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is obvious that more and more people are uselessly driving round town and city areas trying to find parking spaces. This increases congestion on our roads, increases pollution and serves no purpose. By allowing more on street parking the congestion will be reduced and pollution reduced to a tolerable level.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
